docs.snippet: Chelsea forward Eden Hazard has no problems being one of the most fouled players in English soccer's top flight as the physical aspect of the game, he says, brings out the best in him....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea forward Eden Hazard has no problems being one of the most fouled players in English soccer's top flight as the physical aspect of the game, he says, brings out the best in him.

headline.main: Getting Kicked Into Action Brings Out the Best in Hazard

byline.contributor: Mark Scott contributed reporting from Rome.

docs.snippet: Joost van der Westhuizen, who won the 1995 World Cup with South Africa as Nelson Mandela looked on, has died after a six-year-battle with motor neuron disease. He was 45....

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Theresa May is seeking parliament's approval to trigger the legal process for leaving the European Union. To do that she is trying to pass a new law giving her the right to notify the EU of Britain's intention to leave....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May is seeking parliament's approval to trigger the legal process for leaving the European Union. To do that she is trying to pass a new law giving her the right to notify the EU of Britain's intention to leave.
